title: What is an artificial Intelligence production system? - Quora

response.answer_text: One in which the assembly line is managed by AI - sensors check the quality of products, orders are translated into commands for assembly line, assessments for raw materials and maintenance/spare parts are turned into orders for suppliers - like a company whose entire management is reduced to only one entity - the AI. There are problems with such a system - you need a lot of checks and balances in order to verify that is working properly in real world - because real world has the nasty habit of throwing ever newer problems into AI gears. For a more detailed approach, see this site I found on the net about this topic: What’s An Artificial Intelligence Production System? Here Are The Basics
